cirklo.cirklo_info_text:
Cirklo Light is a gift card initiative of [Our City App](http://ourcityapps.com) & [The Studio](https://thestudio.digital) that focuses on cities and municipalities. This out-of-the-box solution allows cities and municipalities to donate **their own gift cards** to their residents or to have them purchased by them. These vouchers are then spent in a **network of local entrepreneurs**, which can be selected by the city or municipality. All this to **give the local economy a boost**.

Don't risk anything and upload the value of your gift card into your **city app**. Scan the QR code of your voucher via this app with a simple push of the 'Scan Gift Card' button. This way you always have your gift card  in your pocket, handy and safe. Local shopping has never been so **simple and 'contactless'.**

Gift card used up? Go to [cirklo-light.com](http://cirklo-light.com) and see if you can buy another one.
cirklo.cirklo_merchants_info: These are the merchants where you can use your vouchers.
cirklo.confirm_delete_voucher: Are you sure you want to delete this voucher?
cirklo.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, please retry again later.
cirklo.update_app_to_use_feat: You need to update the app to use this feature.
cirklo.voucher_used_up_description: This voucher is completely used up. Would you like to give your local traders some extra support? Then surf to {{url}}
cirklo.vouchers_info: Have you recently purchased or received a gift voucher from your city or municipality via Cirklo Light? Then you can upload its value here. So you always have it in your pocket! Scan the QR code of your receipt by pressing the button below and have fun shopping!
